sourcesContent:
<template>


</template>
<script>
import * as echarts from 'echarts'
//1
//5
import router from '@/router/router-static'
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			line: $template2.back.board.line,
			bar: $template2.back.board.bar,
			pie: $template2.back.board.pie,
            systemIntroductionDetail: {},
			dates: '',
            userCount: 0,
		};
	},
  mounted(){
    this.init();
    this.getuserCount();
    this.userChat3();
    this.shangpinxinxiChat5();
    this.shangpinxinxiChat2();
    this.shangpinxinxiChat4();
    this.shangpinxinxiChat1();
  },
  created() {
    this.$nextTick(()=>{
		this.times()
	})
  },
  methods:{
    getTimeStrToDay(game_over_timestamp) {
        if (game_over_timestamp == 0)
            return "";
        var date = new Date(parseInt(game_over_timestamp));
        var now = new Date();
        var hours = date.getHours() >= 10 ? date.getHours().toString() : "0" + date.getHours();
        var minutes = date.getMinutes() >= 10 ? date.getMinutes().toString() : "0" + date.getMinutes();
        var seconds = date.getSeconds() >= 10 ? date.getSeconds().toString() : "0" + date.getSeconds();
        let arr = ["日", "一", "二", "三", "四", "五", "六"];
        let d = arr[date.getDay()]
        return date.getFullYear() + "年" + (date.getMonth() + 1) + "月" + date.getDate() + '日' + ' ' + ' ' + '星期' + d  + ' ' + "  " + hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + seconds
    },
	times() {
		setInterval(()=>{
            let date = new Date().getTime()
            this.dates = this.getTimeStrToDay(date)
		}, 1000)
	},
	filterTime(time) {
	  const date = new Date(time)
	  const Y = date.getFullYear()
	  const M = date.getMonth() + 1 < 10 ? '0'+(date.getMonth()+1) : date.getMonth()+1 
	  const D = date.getDate() < 10 ? '0' + date.getDate() : date.getDate()
	  
	  const H = date.getHours() < 10 ? '0' + date.getHours() : date.getHours() // 小时
	  const I = date.getMinutes() < 10 ? '0' + date.getMinutes() : date.getMinutes() // 分钟
	  const S = date.getSeconds() < 10 ? '0' + date.getSeconds() : date.getSeconds() // 秒
	  
	  return `${Y}-${M}-${D} ${H}:${I}:${S}`
	},
    getSystemIntroduction() {
        this.$http({
            url: `systemintro/detail/1`,
            method: "get"
        }).then(({
            data
        }) => {
            if (data && data.code == 0) {
                this.systemIntroductionDetail = data.data
            }
        })
    },
    init(){
        if(this.$storage.get('Token')){
        this.$http({
            url: `${this.$storage.get('sessionTable')}/session`,
            method: "get"
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code != 0) {
            router.push({ name: 'login' })
            }
        });
        }else{
            router.push({ name: 'login' })
        }
        this.getSystemIntroduction();
    },






















    getuserCount() {
        this.$http({
            url: `user/count`,
            method: "get"
        }).then(({
            data
        }) => {
            if (data && data.code == 0) {
                this.userCount = data.data
            }
        })
    },

//统计接口1
    userChat3() {
      this.$nextTick(()=>{

        var userChart3 = echarts.init(document.getElementById("userChart3"),'macarons');
        this.$http({
            url: "user/typeStat/xingbie",
            method: "get",
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code === 0) {
                let res = data.data;
                let xAxis = [];
                let yAxis = [];
                let pArray = []
                for(let i=0;i<res.length;i++){
                    xAxis.push(res[i].xingbie);
                    yAxis.push(parseFloat((res[i].total)));
                    pArray.push({
                        value: parseFloat((res[i].total)),
                        name: res[i].xingbie
                    })
                }
                var option = {};
				let titleObj = this.pie.title
				titleObj.text = '性别统计'
				
				const legendObj = this.pie.legend
				
				let seriesObj = {
					type: 'pie',
					radius: '55%',
					center: ['50%', '60%'],
					data: pArray,
					emphasis: {
						itemStyle: {
							shadowBlur: 10,
							shadowOffsetX: 0,
							shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
						}
					}
				}
				seriesObj = Object.assign(seriesObj , this.pie.series)
				
                option = {
					backgroundColor: this.pie.backgroundColor,
					color: this.pie.color,
					title: titleObj,
					legend: legendObj,
					tooltip: {
						trigger: 'item',
						formatter: '{b} : {c} ({d}%)'
					},
					series: [seriesObj]
                };
                // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。
                userChart3.setOption(option);
                  //根据窗口的大小变动图表
                window.onresize = function() {
                    userChart3.resize();
                };
            }
        });
      })
    },






















//统计接口1
    shangpinxinxiChat5() {
      this.$nextTick(()=>{
        // shangpinmingcheng shangpinmingcheng
        //  shangpinjiage

        var shangpinxinxiChart5 = echarts.init(document.getElementById("shangpinxinxiChart5"),'mint');
        this.$http({
            url: `shangpinxinxi/value/shangpinmingcheng/shangpinjiage`,
            method: "get",
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code === 0) {
                let res = data.data;
                let xAxis = [];
                let yAxis = [];
                let pArray = []
                for(let i=0;i<res.length;i++){
                    xAxis.push(res[i].shangpinmingcheng);
                    yAxis.push(parseFloat((res[i].total)));
                    pArray.push({
                        value: parseFloat((res[i].total)),
                        name: res[i].shangpinmingcheng
                    })
                }
                var option = {};
				let titleObj = this.bar.title
				titleObj.text = '价格统计'
				
				const legendObj = this.bar.legend
				
				let xAxisObj = this.bar.xAxis
				xAxisObj.type = 'category'
				xAxisObj.data = xAxis
				
				let yAxisObj = this.bar.yAxis
				yAxisObj.type = 'value'
				
				let seriesObj = {
                        data: yAxis,
                        type: 'bar'
                    }
				seriesObj = Object.assign(seriesObj , this.bar.series)

                option = {
					backgroundColor: this.bar.backgroundColor,
					color: this.bar.color,
                    title: titleObj,
					legend: legendObj,
                    tooltip: {
						trigger: 'item',
						formatter: '{b} : {c}'
                    },
                    xAxis: xAxisObj,
                    yAxis: yAxisObj,
                    series: [seriesObj]
                };
                // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。
                shangpinxinxiChart5.setOption(option);
                  //根据窗口的大小变动图表
                window.onresize = function() {
                    shangpinxinxiChart5.resize();
                };
            }
        });
      })
    },

//统计接口2
    shangpinxinxiChat2() {
      this.$nextTick(()=>{

        var shangpinxinxiChart2 = echarts.init(document.getElementById("shangpinxinxiChart2"),'mint');
        this.$http({
            url: "shangpinxinxi/group/shangpinfenlei",
            method: "get",
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code === 0) {
                let res = data.data;
                let xAxis = [];
                let yAxis = [];
                let pArray = []
                for(let i=0;i<res.length;i++){
                    xAxis.push(res[i].shangpinfenlei);
                    yAxis.push(parseFloat((res[i].total)));
                    pArray.push({
                        value: parseFloat((res[i].total)),
                        name: res[i].shangpinfenlei
                    })
                }
                var option = {};
                let titleObj = this.pie.title
				titleObj.text = '商品分类'
				
				const legendObj = this.pie.legend
				
				let seriesObj = {
					type: 'pie',
					radius: '55%',
					center: ['50%', '60%'],
					data: pArray,
					emphasis: {
						itemStyle: {
							shadowBlur: 10,
							shadowOffsetX: 0,
							shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
						}
					}
				}
				seriesObj = Object.assign(seriesObj , this.pie.series)
				
				option = {
					backgroundColor: this.pie.backgroundColor,
					color: this.pie.color,
					title: titleObj,
					legend: legendObj,
					tooltip: {
						trigger: 'item',
						formatter: '{b} : {c} ({d}%)'
					},
					series: [seriesObj]
				};
                // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。
                shangpinxinxiChart2.setOption(option);
                  //根据窗口的大小变动图表
                window.onresize = function() {
                    shangpinxinxiChart2.resize();
                };
            }
        });
      })
    },

//统计接口3
    shangpinxinxiChat4() {
      this.$nextTick(()=>{
        // shangpinmingcheng shangpinmingcheng
        //  shangpinshuliang

        var shangpinxinxiChart4 = echarts.init(document.getElementById("shangpinxinxiChart4"),'mint');
        this.$http({
            url: `shangpinxinxi/value/shangpinmingcheng/shangpinshuliang`,
            method: "get",
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code === 0) {
                let res = data.data;
                let xAxis = [];
                let yAxis = [];
                let pArray = []
                for(let i=0;i<res.length;i++){
                    xAxis.push(res[i].shangpinmingcheng);
                    yAxis.push(parseFloat((res[i].total)));
                    pArray.push({
                        value: parseFloat((res[i].total)),
                        name: res[i].shangpinmingcheng
                    })
                }
                var option = {};
				let titleObj = this.bar.title
				titleObj.text = '数量统计'
				
				const legendObj = this.bar.legend
				
				let xAxisObj = this.bar.xAxis
				xAxisObj.type = 'value'
				
				let yAxisObj = this.bar.yAxis
				yAxisObj.type = 'category'
				yAxisObj.data = xAxis
				
				let seriesObj = {
						data: yAxis,
						type: 'bar'
					}
				seriesObj = Object.assign(seriesObj , this.bar.series)

				option = {
					backgroundColor: this.bar.backgroundColor,
					color: this.bar.color,
					title: titleObj,
					legend: legendObj,
					tooltip: {
						trigger: 'item',
						formatter: '{b} : {c}'
					},
					xAxis: xAxisObj,
					yAxis: yAxisObj,
					series: [seriesObj]
				};
                // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。
                shangpinxinxiChart4.setOption(option);
                  //根据窗口的大小变动图表
                window.onresize = function() {
                    shangpinxinxiChart4.resize();
                };
            }
        });
      })
    },

//统计接口4
    shangpinxinxiChat1() {
      this.$nextTick(()=>{
        //  shangpinshuliang
        // guoqiriqi guoqiriqi

        var shangpinxinxiChart1 = echarts.init(document.getElementById("shangpinxinxiChart1"),'mint');
        this.$http({
            url: `shangpinxinxi/value/guoqiriqi/shangpinshuliang/月`,
            method: "get",
        }).then(({ data }) => {
            if (data && data.code === 0) {
                let res = data.data;
                let xAxis = [];
                let yAxis = [];
                let pArray = []
                for(let i=0;i<res.length;i++){
                    xAxis.push(res[i].guoqiriqi);
                    yAxis.push(parseFloat((res[i].total)));
                    pArray.push({
                        value: parseFloat((res[i].total)),
                        name: res[i].guoqiriqi
                    })
                }
                var option = {};
				let titleObj = this.line.title
				titleObj.text = '商品分类'
				
				const legendObj = this.line.legend
				
				let xAxisObj = this.line.xAxis
				xAxisObj.type = 'category'
				xAxisObj.boundaryGap = false
				xAxisObj.data = xAxis
				
				let yAxisObj = this.line.yAxis
				yAxisObj.type = 'value'
				
				let seriesObj = {
					data: yAxis,
					type: 'line',
					smooth: true
				}
				seriesObj = Object.assign(seriesObj , this.line.series)
				
				option = {
					backgroundColor: this.line.backgroundColor,
					color: this.line.color,
					title: titleObj,
					legend: legendObj,
					tooltip: {
						trigger: 'item',
						formatter: '{b} : {c}'
					},
					xAxis: xAxisObj,
					yAxis: yAxisObj,
					series: [seriesObj]
				};
                // 使用刚指定的配置项和数据显示图表。
                shangpinxinxiChart1.setOption(option);
                  //根据窗口的大小变动图表
                window.onresize = function() {
                    shangpinxinxiChart1.resize();
                };
            }
        });
      })
    },





































































































































































































































































































  }
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .cardView {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        width: 100%;

        .cards {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            justify-content: center;
            .card {
                width: calc(25% - 20px);
                margin: 0 10px;
                /deep/.el-card__body{
                    padding: 0;
                }
            }
        }
    }
	





</style>
